verses.text: Elihu \w also|strong="H3254"\w* \w proceeded|strong="H3254"\w*, \w and|strong="H3254"\w* said,

\w Suffer|strong="H3803"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H2191"\w*, \w and|strong="H5750"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5750"\w* \w shew|strong="H2331"\w* thee: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H4405"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* somewhat \w to|strong="H3588"\w* \w say|strong="H4405"\w* \w on|strong="H4405"\w* Godâ€™s behalf.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w fetch|strong="H5375"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1843"\w* \w from|strong="H7350"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w*, \w and|strong="H6664"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w ascribe|strong="H5414"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w Maker|strong="H6466"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w truly|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w* \w are|strong="H5973"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w false|strong="H8267"\w*: \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w* \w in|strong="H8549"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1844"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w mighty|strong="H3524"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w despiseth|strong="H3988"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3808"\w*: \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w mighty|strong="H3524"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* preserveth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w life|strong="H2421"\w* \w of|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w* \add their \add*\w right|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w withdraweth|strong="H1639"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w from|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w upon|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w setteth|strong="H3427"\w* \w them|strong="H3427"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w exalted|strong="H1361"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6040"\w* if \w they|strong="H3920"\w* \w be|strong="H2256"\w* bound \w in|strong="H3920"\w* \w fetters|strong="H2131"\w*, \w and|strong="H6040"\w* \w be|strong="H2256"\w* \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* \w in|strong="H3920"\w* \w the|strong="H3920"\w* \w cords|strong="H2256"\w* \w of|strong="H2256"\w* \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w*;

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w sheweth|strong="H5046"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w work|strong="H6467"\w*, \w and|strong="H5046"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* behaved \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w* proudly.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w openeth|strong="H1540"\w* \w also|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* ear \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* commandeth \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* iniquity.

If \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \add him\add*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w spend|strong="H3615"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w prosperity|strong="H2896"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w pleasures|strong="H5273"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* if \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w perish|strong="H1478"\w* \w by|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w sword|strong="H7973"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H1478"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3820"\w* \w godless|strong="H2611"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H7760"\w* anger: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w cry|strong="H7768"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w help|strong="H7768"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* bindeth \w them|strong="H7760"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5315"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w youth|strong="H5290"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H4191"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \add perisheth \add*among \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w unclean|strong="H6945"\w*.

He \w delivereth|strong="H2502"\w* \w the|strong="H1540"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w* \w by|strong="H1540"\w* \w his|strong="H1540"\w* \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w*, \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w openeth|strong="H1540"\w* \w their|strong="H1540"\w* ear \w in|strong="H6041"\w* \w oppression|strong="H3906"\w*.

Yea, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w would|strong="H6862"\w* \w have|strong="H6862"\w* led \w thee|strong="H5496"\w* \w away|strong="H5496"\w* \w out|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w distress|strong="H6862"\w* into \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w broad|strong="H7338"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*, \w where|strong="H8478"\w* \w there|strong="H8478"\w* \w is|strong="H6310"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w straitness|strong="H4164"\w*; \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w which|strong="H5183"\w* \w is|strong="H6310"\w* \w set|strong="H4390"\w* \w on|strong="H8478"\w* \w thy|strong="H4390"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w* should \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w fatness|strong="H1880"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7563"\w* thou art \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*: \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w take|strong="H8551"\w* \w hold|strong="H8551"\w* \add on thee\add*.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* there \w is|strong="H2534"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*, \w beware|strong="H6435"\w* \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* led \w away|strong="H5186"\w* \w by|strong="H3588"\w* \add thy \add*\w sufficiency|strong="H5607"\w*; neither \w let|strong="H5186"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* greatness \w of|strong="H2534"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ransom|strong="H3724"\w* \w turn|strong="H5186"\w* \w thee|strong="H5496"\w* \w aside|strong="H5186"\w*.

\w Will|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H6186"\w* \w riches|strong="H7769"\w* suffice, \add that thou be \add*\w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* distress, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w forces|strong="H3981"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \add thy \add*\w strength|strong="H3581"\w*?

\w Desire|strong="H7602"\w* \w not|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w when|strong="H5927"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* cut \w off|strong="H5927"\w* \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H8478"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H8104"\w* \w heed|strong="H8104"\w*, \w regard|strong="H6437"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* iniquity: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* hast \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* chosen \w rather|strong="H3588"\w* \w than|strong="H5921"\w* \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w God|strong="H4310"\w* doeth loftily \w in|strong="H3384"\w* \w his|strong="H3384"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w*: \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w teacher|strong="H3384"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* unto \w him|strong="H3384"\w*?

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* hath \w enjoined|strong="H6485"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*? \w or|strong="H1870"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* say, Thou hast \w wrought|strong="H6466"\w* \w unrighteousness|strong="H5766"\w*?

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* \w magnify|strong="H7679"\w* \w his|strong="H2142"\w* \w work|strong="H6467"\w*, whereof \w men|strong="H7891"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w sung|strong="H7891"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w looked|strong="H5027"\w* thereon; \w man|strong="H3605"\w* beholdeth \w it|strong="H3605"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H8141"\w* \w great|strong="H7689"\w*, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w him|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*; \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w is|strong="H8141"\w* \w unsearchable|strong="H2714"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* draweth up \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w drops|strong="H5198"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w which|strong="H4325"\w* distil \w in|strong="H4306"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* \w from|strong="H4325"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* vapour:

\w Which|strong="H7227"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w skies|strong="H7834"\w* \w pour|strong="H5140"\w* \w down|strong="H7491"\w* \w and|strong="H7227"\w* \w drop|strong="H7491"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* man \w abundantly|strong="H7227"\w*.

Yea, can any understand the \w spreadings|strong="H4666"\w* \w of|strong="H5645"\w* the \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w*, the thunderings \w of|strong="H5645"\w* \w his|strong="H5645"\w* \w pavilion|strong="H5521"\w*?

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w spreadeth|strong="H6566"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* light \w around|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*; \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w covereth|strong="H3680"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bottom|strong="H8328"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H5414"\w* \w these|strong="H5971"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w judgeth|strong="H1777"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w*; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* meat \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w abundance|strong="H4342"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w covereth|strong="H3680"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* lightning; \w and|strong="H3709"\w* giveth \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w charge|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w strike|strong="H6293"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mark|strong="H6293"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w noise|strong="H7452"\w* \w thereof|strong="H7452"\w* \w telleth|strong="H5046"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* also \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \add the storm \add*\w that|strong="H5927"\w* \w cometh|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*.
